name: Shadow Heroes: Vengeance In Flames
blurb: Multiplayer, RTS, Massive Battles, Explosions . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Welcome to Hendrika

rewards.reward: SUPPORTER\r\n==============================\r\nThanks for believing in our game. You will receive exclusive development updates through our Kickstarter page and can participate in backer-only polls related to new gameplay and content ideas.

BACKER ==============================\r\nDigital download of the full game when it is ready for release. Shadow Heroes will ship on PC initially. We would like to make the game available for Mac and Linux, but can't commit to those platforms yet.

THE EARLY BIRD\r\n==============================\r\nA digital copy of Shadow Heroes when it's ready for release plus early access to the game through a digital download of the beta, with free updates all the way through the game's final release! Plus you'll get access to our beta-backers forum to give early feedback on the game, and a special thanks in the game's credits. We'll also throw in an exclusive HELM OF THE BRAVE to boost your units defense on the battlefield!

BUDDY BACKER ==============================\r\nTwice the rewards of the backer ties for just $10 more. Nothing beats playing with your friends so get them a copy too. TWO Digital downloads of the full game when it is ready for release.

THE COMPETITOR\r\n==============================\r\nA digital copy of Shadow Heroes when it's ready for release plus early access to the game through a digital download of the beta, with free updates all the way through the game's final release! Plus you'll get access to our beta-backers forum to give early feedback on the game, and a special thanks in the game's credits. We'll also throw in an exclusive HELM OF THE BRAVE to boost your units defense on the battlefield!

THE DIGITAL SCHOLAR \r\n==============================\r\nA copy of the game, early access to the beta, free updates, beta forum, thanks in the credits and the helm. PLUS, DIGITAL ARTBOOK with behind the scenes concept art, a DIGITAL MAP of the realm of Hendrika and a TOME OF KNOWLEDGE to increase your units damage on the battlefield by exploiting enemy weak points.

THE BARD\r\n============================== \r\nEverything in the Digital Scholar pack: A copy of the game, beta, free updates, beta forum, thanks in the credits, helm, art book, map and tome. Plus a digital download of the full Shadow Heroes Soundtrack.

THE TAILOR\r\n============================== \r\nEverything in the bard tier:  A copy of the game, beta, free updates, beta forum, thanks in the credits, helm, art book, map, tome and soundtrack. Plus your very own SHADOW HEROES T-SHIRT.

THE COLLECTOR\r\n==============================\r\nEverything in the Tailor tier: A copy of the game, beta, free updates, beta forum, thanks in the credits, helm, art book, map, tome and soundtrack and T-Shirt. Plus, we will mail you a SIGNED POSTER offered exclusively through Kickstarter.

THE LIEUTENANT\r\n==============================\r\nEverything in the collector pack: A copy of the game, beta, free updates, beta forum, thanks in the credits, helm, art book, map, tome, soundtrack, T-Shirt and signed poster. Plus, you will gain get a unique UNIT SKIN for you to show off!

THE ANCIENT\r\n============================== \r\nEverything in the Lieutenant tier: A copy of the game, beta, free updates, beta forum, thanks in the credits, helm, art book, map, tome, soundtrack, T-Shirt, signed poster and unit skin. Plus have one of the world's monuments made after your(or a friend/relatives) likeness! Your face will be part of the history of Hendrika as one of its many statues!

THE COMPLETIONIST\r\n============================== \r\nEverything in the Ancient tier: A copy of the game, beta, free updates, beta forum, thanks in the credits, helm, art book, map, tome, soundtrack, T-Shirt, signed poster, unit skin and in game statue! PLUS a 3D Printed Statuette of one of the characters from Shadow Heroes.

THE MAKER\r\n ============================== \r\nEverything in the completionist tier: A copy of the game, beta, free updates, beta forum, thanks in the credits, helm, art book, map, tome, soundtrack, T-Shirt, signed poster, unit skin, game statue, statuette AND collaborate with our team to design a multiplayer level and be credited as a level design consultant in our game credits.

THE PROFESSIONAL ==============================Everything in the completionist tier: A copy of the game, beta, free updates, beta forum, thanks in the credits, helm, art book, map, tome, soundtrack, T-Shirt, signed poster, unit skin and in game statue and statuette. Plus Work closely with the team to HELP DEVELOP A NEW UNIT in the game. You will get the producers direct email address and credited as a character designer in the game credits.
